title: Analysis of Seagram Bldg International Style

content.question: What technological innovations enabled the construction of skyscrapers such as this one? Discuss this building as an example of the International Style in architecture.

frqParts.text: What technological innovations enabled the construction of skyscrapers such as this one? Discuss this building as an example of the International Style in architecture.

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
